verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> toward <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5197>drop<s%> your word toward the <S%H4720>sanctuaries,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

and <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H3318>Behold,<s%> I am against you, and will draw forth my <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of its <S%H8593>sheath,<s%> and will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from you the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

<S%H3282>Seeing<s%> then that I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from you the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> therefore shall my <S%H2719>sword<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of its <S%H8593>sheath<s%> against all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to the <S%H6828>north:<s%>

and all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have drawn <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of its <S%H8593>sheath;<s%> it shall not return any <S%H7725>more.<s%>

<S%H584>Sigh<s%> <S%H1121>therefore,<s%> you son of <S%H120>man;<s%> with the <S%H7670>breaking<s%> of your <S%H4975>thighs<s%> and with <S%H4814>bitterness<s%> you will <S%H584>sigh<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

It shall <S%H559>be,<s%> when they tell <S%H584>you,<s%> Why do you sigh? that you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> Because of the <S%H8052>news,<s%> for it <S%H935>comes;<s%> and every <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H4549>melt,<s%> and all <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H7503>feeble,<s%> and every <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall <S%H3543>faint,<s%> and all <S%H1290>knees<s%> shall be <S%H3212>weak<s%> as <S%H4325>water:<s%> <S%H935>behold,<s%> it comes, and it shall be <S%H1961>done,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H559>Say,<s%> A <S%H2719>sword,<s%> a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> it is <S%H2300>sharpened,<s%> and also <S%H4803>furbished;<s%>

it is <S%H2300>sharpened<s%> that it may make <S%H2874>a<s%> <S%H2873>slaughter;<s%> it is <S%H4178>furbished<s%> that it may be as <S%H1300>lightning:<s%> <S%H176>shall<s%> we then make <S%H7797>mirth?<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of my <S%H1121>son,<s%> it <S%H3988>condemns<s%> every <S%H6086>tree.<s%>

It is <S%H5414>given<s%> to be <S%H4803>furbished,<s%> that it may be <S%H3709>handled:<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> it is <S%H2300>sharpened,<s%> <S%H4178>yes,<s%> it is furbished, to <S%H5414>give<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2026>killer.<s%>

<S%H2199>Cry<s%> and <S%H3213>wail,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man;<s%> for it is on my <S%H5971>people,<s%> it is on all the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> they are <S%H4048>delivered<s%> over <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> with my <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H5606>strike<s%> therefore on your <S%H3409>thigh.<s%>
For there is a <S%H974>trial;<s%> and what if even the <S%H7626>rod<s%> that <S%H3988>condemns<s%> shall be no <S%H5002>more?<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

You <S%H1121>therefore,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> your <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5221>together;<s%> and let the <S%H2719>sword<s%> be <S%H3717>doubled<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2719>time,<s%> the sword of the deadly <S%H2491>wounded:<s%> it is the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> one who is deadly <S%H2491>wounded,<s%> which enters into their <S%H2314>rooms.<s%>

I have <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H19>threatening<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> against all their <S%H8179>gates,<s%> that their <S%H3820>heart<s%> may <S%H4127>melt,<s%> and their <S%H4383>stumblings<s%> be <S%H7235>multiplied:<s%> <S%H253>ah!<s%> it is <S%H6213>made<s%> as <S%H1300>lightning,<s%> it is <S%H4593>pointed<s%> for <S%H2874>slaughter.<s%>

Gather yourselves <S%H258>together,<s%> go <S%H7760>to<s%> the <S%H3231>right,<s%> set yourselves in <S%H8041>array,<s%> go to the left, <S%H575>wherever<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H3259>set.<s%>
I will also <S%H5221>strike<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H3709>together,<s%> and I will cause my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> to <S%H5117>rest:<s%> <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have spoken <S%H1696>it.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to me <S%H559>again,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Also,<s%> you son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>appoint<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> that the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> may <S%H935>come;<s%> they <S%H8147>both<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> and mark <S%H1254>out<s%> a <S%H3027>place,<s%> mark it <S%H1254>out<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

You shall <S%H7760>appoint<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> of the children of <S%H1121>Ammon,<s%> and to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H1219>fortified.<s%>

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H517>parting<s%> of the <S%H1870>way,<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> to <S%H7080>use<s%> <S%H7081>divination:<s%> he <S%H7043>shook<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> back and <S%H7592>forth,<s%> he consulted the <S%H8655>teraphim,<s%> he <S%H7200>looked<s%> in the <S%H3516>liver.<s%>

In his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> was the <S%H7081>divination<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H7760>set<s%> battering <S%H3733>rams,<s%> to <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H7524>slaughter,<s%> to lift <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting,<s%> to <S%H7760>set<s%> battering <S%H3733>rams<s%> against the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> to <S%H8210>cast<s%> up <S%H5550>mounds,<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1785>forts.<s%>

It shall be to them as a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7080>divination<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> who have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H7621>oaths<s%> to <S%H5771>them;<s%> but he brings iniquity to <S%H2142>memory,<s%> that they may be <S%H8610>taken.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> Because you have made your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered,<s%> in that your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H1540>uncovered,<s%> so that in all your <S%H5949>doings<s%> your <S%H2403>sins<s%> <S%H7200>appear;<s%> because you have come to <S%H2142>memory,<s%> you shall be <S%H8610>taken<s%> with the <S%H3709>hand.<s%>

<S%H2491>You,<s%> deadly wounded <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5387>one,<s%> the prince of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whose <S%H3117>day<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H7093>end,<s%>

thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H5493>Remove<s%> the <S%H4701>turban,<s%> and take <S%H7311>off<s%> the <S%H5850>crown;<s%> this shall be no more the <S%H2063>same;<s%> <S%H1361>exalt<s%> that which is <S%H8217>low,<s%> and <S%H8213>abase<s%> that which is <S%H1364>high.<s%>

I will <S%H5754>overturn,<s%> <S%H5754>overturn,<s%> <S%H5754>overturn<s%> <S%H7760>it:<s%> this also shall be no <S%H935>more,<s%> until he come whose <S%H4941>right<s%> it <S%H5414>is;<s%> and I will give it him.

<S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> concerning the children of <S%H1121>Ammon,<s%> and concerning their <S%H2781>reproach;<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> A <S%H2719>sword,<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H6605>drawn,<s%> for the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%> it is <S%H4803>furbished,<s%> to cause it to <S%H398>devour,<s%> that it may be as <S%H1300>lightning;<s%>

while they <S%H2372>see<s%> for you false <S%H7080>visions,<s%> while they divine <S%H3577>lies<s%> to <S%H6677>you,<s%> to lay you on the necks of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> who are deadly <S%H3117>wounded,<s%> whose day has <S%H935>come<s%> in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H7093>end.<s%>

Cause it to <S%H7725>return<s%> into its <S%H8593>sheath.<s%> In the <S%H4725>place<s%> where you were <S%H1254>created,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4351>birth,<s%> will I judge <S%H8199>you.<s%>

I will pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2195>indignation<s%> on <S%H6315>you;<s%> I will blow on you with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1197>brutish<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H2796>skillful<s%> to <S%H4889>destroy.<s%>

You shall be for <S%H402>fuel<s%> to the <S%H784>fire;<s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> you shall be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> no <S%H3068>more:<s%> for I, Yahweh, have spoken <S%H1696>it.<s%>
